abstract.t: IPv6-in-(foo)-in-IPv4 tunnels support a minimum Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) of 1280 bytes for IPv6 via static prearrangements and/or dynamic MTU determination based on ICMPv4 messages, but these methods have known operational limitations. This document specifies link adaptation mechanisms for IPv6-in-(foo)-in-IPv4 tunnels that present an assured MTU to the IPv6 layer using tunnel endpoint-based segmentation/reassembly and dynamic segment size probing.
